line.comment: * Gnasirator, 05.03.2012
* reduce free amount to keep space for fuel!
* always DECREASE calculated value of free space
* if more fuel on board than fuel.max don't do anything. original amount is okay
* Up to here: We have proper buyamount that fits for trader, buy- and sellstation
* And it keeps space free for fuelling up!
* Now check for ship hard ware and locked wares if we can fill up any of them
* Check ship hard ware
* If buying missiles, the ship will have restocked the reserve amount when docked
* this happens automatically
* If buying EC anyway, don't keep space free for fuel.
* else if $ware == {Fighter Drone} AND $experience >= 20
* Only buy extra drones mk1 if there aren't enough drones mk2 on board
* $drones.mk2.onboard = [THIS]-> get true amount of ware {Fighter Drone MKII} in cargo bay
* do if $drones.mk2.onboard < 4
* $amount.needed.extra = 15 - $amount.onboard
* else if $ware == {Fighter Drone MKII} AND $experience >= 20
* $amount.needed.extra = 15 - $amount.onboard
* TODO: What's this? is this even used, consider removing statement completely, instead of just the xp requirements (REMOVED: 'AND $experience >= 12')
* check saved ware blacklist amounts if we can fill up any
* if there is enough space in cargo bay for additional ware, buy it
* Else load at least as much as possible
* Check if trader can afford amount
* return amount.needed.extra, too, as this amount mustn't be taken into profit cal

sval.val: Autotrade - Calculates the buyamount
Gnasirator, 05.03.2012
reduce free amount to keep space for fuel!
always DECREASE calculated value of free space
if more fuel on board than fuel.max don't do anything. original amount is okay
Up to here: We have proper buyamount that fits for trader, buy- and sellstation
And it keeps space free for fuelling up!
Now check for ship hard ware and locked wares if we can fill up any of them
Check ship hard ware
If buying missiles, the ship will have restocked the reserve amount when docked
this happens automatically
If buying EC anyway, don't keep space free for fuel.
else if $ware == {Fighter Drone} AND $experience >= 20
Only buy extra drones mk1 if there aren't enough drones mk2 on board
$drones.mk2.onboard = [THIS]-> get true amount of ware {Fighter Drone MKII} in cargo bay
do if $drones.mk2.onboard < 4
$amount.needed.extra = 15 - $amount.onboard
else if $ware == {Fighter Drone MKII} AND $experience >= 20
$amount.needed.extra = 15 - $amount.onboard
TODO: What's this? is this even used, consider removing statement completely, instead of just the xp requirements (REMOVED: 'AND $experience >= 12')
check saved ware blacklist amounts if we can fill up any
if there is enough space in cargo bay for additional ware, buy it
Else load at least as much as possible
Check if trader can afford amount
return amount.needed.extra, too, as this amount mustn't be taken into profit cal
